member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.Register(AuthService.DTOs.RegisterDto)
member.returns: A success message and a token if registration is successful.

member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.Login(AuthService.DTOs.LoginDto)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.
member.returns: A JWT token if authentication is successful.

member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.LoginWithFacebook(System.String)
member.summary: Logs in a user using a Facebook access token.
member.returns: A JWT token if login is successful.

member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.LoginWithGoogle(System.String)
member.summary: Logs in a user using a Google ID token.
member.returns: A JWT token if login is successful.

member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.LoginWithPhoneNumber(AuthService.DTOs.PhoneNumberLoginDto)
member.summary: Logs in a user using a phone number and verification code.
member.param: The phone number and verification code.
member.returns: A JWT token if login is successful.

member.name: M:AuthService.Controllers.AuthController.ValidateToken(System.String)
member.returns: A success message if the token is valid.
